rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0001
rows.name: How wonderful...

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0002
rows.name:
Please look at this scenery.
This is the beauty of nature.

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0003
rows.name:
...You're right, this expansive
view is truly unique.

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0004
rows.name:
...You're right, this sweeping
landscape is really one of a kind.

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0005
rows.name:
...Indeed, this beautiful scenen
can't be seen anywhere else.

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0006
rows.name:
...That's right, you can't see
this kind of scenery elsewhere.

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0007
rows.name:
But I thought you preferred more
extravagant things, Tsuki...

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0008
rows.name:
I didn't expect you to
enjoy views like this too.

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0009
rows.name:
...Hoho, You've still got a lot
to learn about me, Kagutsuchi.

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0010
rows.name:
Certainly extravagant and flashy beauty
good too, but natural beauty is probably
the best, don't you think?

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0012
rows.name: Natural beauty?

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0013
rows.name:
...Do you mean that
being natural is best?

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0014
rows.name:
Exactly. Beauty without
any embellishments...

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0015
rows.name:
That's what I think is
the ultimate beauty.

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0016
rows.name: ...Hmm, you think so?

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0025
rows.name:
Take Hana, for instance. She doesn't
care at all about looking beautiful,
but she's still quite adorable, right?

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0026
rows.name: ...I can't argue with that.

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0027
rows.name:
There are countless ways to
polish, decorate, and make
things look beautiful...

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0028
rows.name:
However, that's just making
the appearance look pretty,
and that's a distortion.

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0030
rows.name:
That's why I think beauty
that comes naturally is the
finest kind there is.

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0036
rows.name: What should I say to Tsuki?

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0037
rows.name: You're already beautiful enough, Tsuki.

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0038
rows.name:
Why do you care so much
about natural beauty?

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0039
rows.name: What should I say to Tsuki?

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0040
rows.name:
You're beautiful enough
as you are, Tsuki.

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0041
rows.name:
Why are you so focused
on natural beauty?

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0042
rows.name: What should I say to Tsuki?

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0043
rows.name: You're already quite beautiful, Tsuki.

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0044
rows.name:
Why are you so concerned
with natural beauty?

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0045
rows.name: What should I say to Tsuki?

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0046
rows.name: You're a real beauty already, Tsuki.

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0047
rows.name:
Why do ya care so much
about natural beauty?

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0101
rows.name: You flatter me! But I'm not there yet.

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0102
rows.name:
Like I was saying before, looking
good on the outside isn't enough.

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0103
rows.name:
For instance, if I ate all the
drivers' dinner by myself, you'd be
disenchanted with me, wouldn't you?

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0104
rows.name:
I see, or like abandoning your Driver
and running away during battle.

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0105
rows.name:
After all, it's important
for the heart and spirit
to be beautiful too.

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0106
rows.name:
The beauty that flows forth naturally
from a person, both inside and out...
That's what I'm strivin' for.

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0107
rows.name:
That's why I've decided to
live as my authentic self,
without any pretense.

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0108
rows.name:
I understand. That way of
living really fits you, Tsuki.

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0109
rows.name:
Oh, I get it. Pretty neat
philosophy to live by, I guess.

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0110
rows.name:
I understand. That approach definitely
suits your character, Tsuki.

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0111
rows.name:
I get ya. That's definitely a way
of living that suits ya, Tsuki.

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0112
rows.name:
That's why I want my Driver to
improve himself together with me.

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0201
rows.name:
My attachment to nature... I never
really thought about it that way, but
I might be somewhat fixated on it.

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0202
rows.name: Y'know how humans age over time, right?

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0203
rows.name:
Women tend to think it makes them
unattractive and really dislike it,
but I find it quite beautiful.

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0204
rows.name:
Isn't that a testament to their lived
experience, the physical manifestation
of their accumulated life journey?

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0205
rows.name:
That's why I think it's a
one-of-a-kind artwork in this world.

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0206
rows.name:
I get it, so you're saying
human life itself is a work
of art created by nature.

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0207
rows.name: That's so like you, Tsuki.

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0208
rows.name:
Oh, so human life is essentially
art created by nature.

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0209
rows.name: That's so you, Tsuki.

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0210
rows.name:
So human life is essentially
artwork produced by nature.

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0211
rows.name:
I understand. That perspective
is very much like you, Tsuki.

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0212
rows.name:
Ah, so yer sayin' human life is
art created by nature itself.

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0213
rows.name: That's so incredibly like you, Tsuki.

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0214
rows.name:
Being a Blade, I wasn't
born naturally...

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0215
rows.name:
I came into existence looking like
this, and when my Driver dies, I'll
vanish looking exactly the same...

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0216
rows.name:
With no changes at all, my
existence simply vanishes...

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0217
rows.name:
That's why I'm drawn to the
ephemeral beauty of humans...

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0218
rows.name:
My dear Driver, I bet
you'll age so beautifully.

rows.label: kizunatalk082_msg0219
rows.name: I'm excited to see it. Hehehe...
